Coastal Topo-Bathymetry from a Single-Pass Satellite Video: Insights in Space-Videos for Coastal Monitoring at Duck Beach (NC, USA). Remote Sens. 2022, 14, 1529 <https://doi.org/10.3390/rs11161918>`_
